resources.string: After changing the terminal color, we recommended restart this app.
Treat Ambiguous Characters as full width character for East Asian fonts. (:help ambiwidth)

HOME directory:
Changing the HOME directory is not recommended. Use Startup Directory.

If you change the HOME directory, you will not be able to change the attributes of the file.
You can restore the home directory to the default value by pressing "Default" button.

viminfo:
Since viminfo requires an attribute change, please add `set viminfo+=n$APPFILES/home/.viminfo` to .vimrc.

How to quit:
- Type ":qa".
- Double tap -> "QUIT".

Toggle keyboard:
- Double tap near the bottom of the screen
- Back button

Direct input:
- If you need to enable word suggestions or to input Non-Alphanumeric characters, tap "◇" button on function bar. 
- One-line text box can be turned on/off by "Double tap near the right edge of the screen".

Vim tutorial:
- Tap "Vim tutorial" from the long press menu or type ":Vimtutor".

.vim and .vimrc:

`$HOME` is deleted when uninstalling. So we recommended copy `.vim` and `.vimrc` to internal storage (It can be accessed via filer app) and edit .vimrc via long press menu.
	 HTML and Links:
 
 Open the HTML file in the browser.
 - "Menu" -> "Share" -> "File"
 - `:ShareIntent file`
 
 gx - open URL under the cursor (:h gx)	 Clipboard commands

 Vim command:
 - "*p - Paste from the clipboard.
 - "*yy - Copy to the clipboard.
 
 Only on DroidVim:
 - gY - unnamed register to the clipboard (e.g. yygY)
 - "Menu"->"Share"	 By default direct input is forced, so you may not be able to input your (Non-English)language.
In that case please try the following:

- ◇ Button
- One-line text box
- IME shortcuts(physical keyboard)
- Change "Input mode at startup" to "Normal input"	 Keep screen:

Temporarily change the time to sleep.
 - "Menu"->"Screen"->"Keep screen" 	You can change the text input mode from Vim script.
See "Help"->"Tips"	 External SD card
- To read/write an external SD card, choose "Storage" → "3 dot menu" → "Show SD card".	You can use a 256 terminal color scheme.
Try `:colorscheme term256`	Function bar cursor button direction:
 - Synchronize with the state of the Ctrl button. ESC button to quit.	Swipe the bottom half of the screen left and right to move the cursor.
